attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'd like the people of Britain to support the introduction of a Trade Union Freedom bill

This is essential for Britain as without change we will continue to be the wipping boys of Europe and workers will continue to be exploited by employers

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
